caller_intent: Yuridia Ciero Losano is confirming that a new vehicle (2019 Toyota Tundra) was correctly added to her insurance policy and inquiring why the payment has not been processed yet, as well as the next payment date.
resolution_steps: Agent confirms Yuridia's identity and address (808 Tiperady Drive, Brunswick, NC).
Agent checks the system and verifies the 2019 Toyota Tundra was added on August 25.
Agent explains the vehicle was added but the payment was not processed due to an incorrect email address in the system.
Agent informs Yuridia the next automatic payment will be on September 15 for $79.03.
Agent confirms the policy will renew after the September payment.
systems_referenced: Alliance Insurance's internal policy management system
summary: Agent JC confirms with Yuridia Ciero Losano that her 2019 Toyota Tundra was successfully added to her policy on August 25. The agent explains the next automatic payment of $79.03 will occur on September 15 and assures her the policy will renew after that payment. The call concludes with Yuridia expressing gratitude and satisfaction.
